\noindent \textbf{\footnotesize{}Recent Projects}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\footnotesize{}\rule[0.5ex]{1\linewidth}{1pt}}{\footnotesize \par}
\end{spacing}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2015}}] \noindent \textsc{\footnotesize{}oracle}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}A basic patent analysis system that retrieves and analyses
a company's patents and from the text of the patent identifies the
company's potential research interests.}{\scriptsize \par}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2014}}] \noindent \textsc{\footnotesize{}sequence
based named entity tagger}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}Developed a sequence based NE tagger that would train
on annotated data and a custom feature set and then reliably identify
named entities in unseen texts.}{\scriptsize \par}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2014}}] \textsc{\footnotesize{}http proxy}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}Fully Developed a HTTP v1.0 cached proxy server for
a course homework.}{\scriptsize \par}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2014}}] \textsc{\footnotesize{}dynamic memory allocator}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}Implemented a dynamic memory allocator (similar to the
Malloc package in C) for a course homework.}{\scriptsize \par}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2014}}] \textsc{\footnotesize{}slate}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}Slate is a network-based collaborative whiteboard app
(functionally similar to Google Docs) developed for CarnegieApps Hackathon
2014 in a team of four.}{\scriptsize \par}
\item [{{\footnotesize{}2013}}] \textsc{\footnotesize{}voice operated lemonade
stand game}{\footnotesize{}}\\
{\scriptsize{}Implemented fully function voice control, with user
specific voice callibration, on the classical lemonade stand game
for a course project.}{\scriptsize \par}
\end{lyxlist}
